lyrics:
We'll never get free
Lamb to the slaughter

The price of your greed is your son and your daughter

imageDescription: A raging crimson flood engulfs a decaying city, mirroring the bloodshot eyes of its inhabitants.  Skyscrapers crumble under a stormy sky as a lone wolf, representing rebellion, howls at the opulent doors of a corrupt elite. The art style should be gritty and dystopian, emphasizing the consequences of unchecked greed.
